member.name: T:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.DownloadFileStatus
member.summary: The status of the download file.

member.name: F:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.DownloadFileStatus.INITIALIZED
member.summary: The download is intitalized. It may is already registered in the native download manager.

member.name: F:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.DownloadFileStatus.FAILED
member.summary: The download has failed. You'll find detailed information in the property StatusDetails.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile.Url
member.summary: Gets the URL of the file to download.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile.DestinationPathName
member.summary: Gets the destination path name of the file to download.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile.Headers
member.summary: The headers that are send along when requesting the URL.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile.StatusDetails
member.summary: Gets the status details. F.e. to get the reason why the download failed. On iOS it's a localized string. On Android it's the name of the Enum values (Android.App.DownloadError or Android.App.DownloadPausedReason) as string, prefixed by either `Error` or `Paused` e.g. `Error.HttpDataError` or `Paused.QueuedForWifi`. If (in any case) you encounter the property `Unregistered:` followed by an integer, please report it. These are new values for either enumeration. You can find the reason in the official documentation: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/app/DownloadManager.html Every error-response (status-code gte 400 and lt 600) is prefixed by `Error.HttpCode: `. Be aware that some custom codes, may have unexpected results. E.g the number 497 is reserved for the error message `Error.TooManyRedirects` and 488 would result in the error `Error.FileAlreadyExists`.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile.TotalBytesExpected
member.summary: Gets the amount of bytes expected.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile.TotalBytesWritten
member.summary: Gets the amount of bytes written.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadManager.Queue
member.summary: Gets the queue holding all the pending and downloading files.

member.name: P:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadManager.PathNameForDownloadedFile
member.summary: A function, returning the name of the path, where the download-file, given as argument, should be saved.
member.value: The path name for downloaded file.

member.name: M:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadManager.CreateDownloadFile(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.param: Headers to send along when requesting the URL.

member.name: M:Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadManager.Start(Plugin.DownloadManager.Abstractions.IDownloadFile,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Start downloading the file. Most of the systems will put this file into a queue first.
